participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Creative and curious, with a passion for music and languages.
participant_1.background: one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish. i am a musician. my next language to study is french. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Practical and down-to-earth, enjoys hands-on work and has a nurturing side.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.
